body: Guys what ere you gonna do with the Avicus Network channel?

title: The Avicus Network

replies.body:
man, its an interesting question, but i think you need to be a little more specific, like what do you mean by "DO" with the Avicus Network? and do you mean game, forums or YouTube channel?
BUT it is an interesting question :)
